title: Johnny Blue Skies & The Dark Clouds — Night 1
description: Limited edition Johnny Blue Skies poster from the Sep. 16 performance at Red Rocks Amphitheatre.

editions.label: Matte Edition
editions.description: Screen printed on archival matte stock.
details: High-fidelity screen print on 100 lb cover paper
Soft matte finish keeps the graphite textures crisp

editions.label: Rainbow Foil Edition
editions.description: Screen printed on iridescent rainbow foil stock.
details: Prismatic foil base shifts colour as light passes across the surface
Layered inks create depth while the foil gleams through highlight areas

editions.label: Uncut Foil Sheet
details: Shipped flat with interleaving to preserve the holographic surface
Features printer crop marks and colour bars for collectors
